title: Neural Network from Scratch
description: A simple neural network implemented in Python without any major ML libraries. A great learning exercise!

title: Image Classifier for Cats and Dogs
description: A convolutional neural network (CNN) built with PyTorch to classify images of cats and dogs. Trained on the Kaggle dataset.

title: Sentiment Analysis of Movie Reviews
description: A model that uses natural language processing (NLP) to determine whether a movie review is positive or negative.

title: AI Plays Flappy Bird
description: A reinforcement learning agent that learns to play the game Flappy Bird using the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
